text: A Parisian is a cocktail with dry vermouth, gin, and crème de cassis. Blackberries are a common garnish. The drink was created in the 1920s to promote crème de cassis. ==Variations== The Bobo Parisian has Tanqueray gin, St-Germain, Kina L’avion D’or, rhubarb bitters, an egg white, a splash of club soda, and a star anise garnish. The gin and tonic-inspired version has herbal gin, elderflower liqueur, tonic water, and champagne, and is garnished with a slapped sage leaf or two and a lemon wedge. ==References== Category:Cocktails with gin Category:Cocktails with vermouth
title: Parisian (cocktail)
